Package com.bmd.jrt.routine

Routine interfaces and implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Routine<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    This interface defines the main component of this framework.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRoutine<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Basic abstract implementation of a routine.
    ClassRoutineBuilder
    Class implementing a builder of routines wrapping a class method.
    InvocationRoutineBuilder<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Class implementing a builder of routine objects based on an invocation class token.
    IOChannelBuilder
    Class implementing a builder of I/O channel objects.
    JRoutine
    This utility class represents the entry point to the framework functionalities by acting as a factory of routine builders.
    ObjectRoutineBuilder
    Class implementing a builder of routines wrapping an object instance.
    TemplateRoutine<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Empty abstract implementation of a routine.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RoutineDeadLockException
    Exception indicating that no invocation instance became available before the timeout elapsed.

Package com.bmd.jrt.routine Description

Routine interfaces and implementations.
